projets.name: BashBuild
projets.description: BashBuild is a city management simulation game in the Simscity style but in console version. Indeed, you must build buildings (farms, house,…) which bring in food and money. These resources influence the population of the game. Your objective is therefore to make the latter prosper.

projets.name: WhatsAppLike
projets.description: WhatsappLike is a web application using the "WAL" API to create a Whatsapp copy. Like whastapp, you can add, delete contacts, send messages, …

projets.name: Shootixel
projets.description: Shootixel est un jeu python 2D utilisant la bibliothèque pygame. Votre objectif est de survivre devant les vaisseaux spatiaux ennemis eShootixel is a 2D python game using the pygame library. Your objective is to survive in front of the enemy spaceships by shooting lazers to eliminate them. As the game progresses, the enemies are more and more fast, their trajectories change and bosses may appear. To help you, bonus life, speed and more are there. n tirant lazers pour les éliminer. Au fur et à mesure que le jeu progresse, les ennemis sont de plus en plus rapide, leurs trajectoires changent et des boss peuvent apparaître. Pour vous aider, des bonus de vie, de vitesse et plus encore sont là.

projets.name: DrawApp
projets.description: DrawApp is a Java application that uses swing to make a copy of the Paint drawing application.

projets.name: Scheme GUI
projets.description: This is a SCHEME graphical interface for a directory of names using a text file as a database. You can add, delete contacts as well as save and load your list from the text file.

projets.name: My personal website
projets.description: This is my showcase site almost identical to the one you are on but made with the Wordpress CMS.

projets.name: Image mosaic
projets.description: This is a python script that uses the os, PIL, and random libraries to recreate a background image with the color average of each pixel of other images.

projets.name: Three.js tests
projets.description: These are tests that I do with the three.js library which allows to create, import and handle 3d models in a web page.
